remarks: Upper bound for the distance between the values of a bounded linear operator.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Oct-2015.)
statement:
nmods.n $e |- N = ( S normOp T ) $.
nmods.v $e |- V = ( Base ` S ) $.
nmods.c $e |- C = ( dist ` S ) $.
nmods.d $e |- D = ( dist ` T ) $.
nmods $p |- ( ( F e. ( S NGHom T ) /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( F ` A ) D ( F ` B ) ) <_ ( ( N ` F ) x. ( A C B ) ) ) $.
